text: Pieter "Piet" Dankert (8 January 1934 in Stiens – 21 June 2003 in Perpignan) was a Dutch politician. He was a member of the Labour Party. From 1968 till 1981 he was a member of the Second Chamber.Parlement.com In the late 1970s he moved to the European Parliament, and was President of the European Parliament from 19 January 1982 to 24 July 1984. In the third government of Ruud Lubbers (1989–1994) he was Secretary of State for European matters. From 1994 till 1999 he was again an MEP. == References == Category:1934 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Deputy government ministers of the Netherlands Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:Labour Party (Netherlands) politicians Category:MEPs for the Netherlands Category:Politicians from Friesland Category:Presidents of the European Parliament
title: Piet Dankert
